content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 iron ore in addition to the coal and stone in my inventory.
# Now that I have the iron ore, I can proceed to smelt it into iron plates using the stone furnace.

# First, I will insert some iron ore into the furnace along with the coal that is already there.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert the iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete. I will monitor the furnace for the output.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds.
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 10:  # Check if I have at least 10 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting takes too long.

# After smelting, I will check the inventory to confirm the production of iron plates.
